name: Dawson Design
description:
We're Dawson Design. A vibrant, enthusiastic, straight talking creative design agency based in the heart of Manchester. Since 1986, we have helped our clients all over the world to create eye-catching creative solutions.

Through creative and intelligent problem solving, we help our clients to define their identity and resonate with their audience. Simply put we offer a wide range of branding, marketing and graphic design services that meet our clients needs and deliver results.
